content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources for crafting
- Ensure that you have all necessary ingredients available in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running out of materials.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check the surrounding area for existing entities that may block placement.
